verbs.description: [ARG1: The annual summit] [V: comes] [ARGM-TMP: amid hostility between some member nations over the Trump administration 's decision to place tariffs on imports from Canada , Mexico and the European Union] .

The annual summit comes amid hostility between some member nations over the Trump administration 's decision to [V: place] [ARG1: tariffs] [ARG2: on imports from Canada , Mexico and the European Union] .
